Posts.Title: Anyone have a recommendation for a RO in Dallas/Ft.Worth area? Audrella ladyboss1997

Posts.Content: Audrella wrote: Posting this for my aunt, who lives in Keller Texas.  She's looking for a radiation oncologist and doesn't have anyone in her circle of friends who has ever been to one. Do any of the Texas ladies have a recommendation?
